RemovePermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI.
It is removed when the user performs an explicit checkin action in the UI.
Available values:
* True  removes the permanent lock after the check-in action.
* False  does not remove the lock after the check-in action, such as when the item is still being edited.

UserComment.description: Gets or sets the user comment for this item. If null the user comment is not changed.

BatchCheckOutRequest.description: Represents the request for the check-out batch operation.

SetPermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI and removed when the user performs an explicit checkin action in the UI.
Checkout or checkin actions without permanent lock effectively do nothing if item was checked out with permanent lock.
Available values:
* True  sets a permanent lock that will be removed only when the user performs an explicit check-in action.
* False  sets no lock, which means the check-in and check-out actions effectively do nothing.

Condition.description: Abstract base class for Conditions used in a Target Group definition.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'Condition' (or a class name that inherits from this class)
$type.example: <Set to a class name inheriting from 'Condition'>

Negate.description: Gets or sets whether the condition should be negated.

ConditionOperator.description:
Defines an operator used for comparison.

Members:
* `Equals` - Compares if a numerical operand is equal to the given condition value.
* `GreaterThan` - Compares if a numerical operand is greater than the given condition value.
* `LessThan` - Compares if a numerical operand is less than the given condition value.
* `NotEqual` - Compares if a numerical operand is not equal to the given condition value.
* `StringEquals` - Compares if a string operand is equal to the given condition value.
* `Contains` - Compares if a string operand contains the given condition value.
* `StartsWith` - Compares if a string operand starts with the given condition value.
* `EndsWith` - Compares if a string operand ends with the given condition value.

DecisionActivityFinishRequest.description: Represents the data required for finishing a decision Activity.

DeleteTaxonomyNodeMode.description:
Specifies what will happen to the child nodes of a Taxonomy node after that node's deletion.

Members:
* `DeleteBranch` - Specifies that the entire branch of descendant nodes will be deleted, excluding nodes in child Publications.
* `DeleteBranchIncludeChildPublications` - Specifies that the entire branch of descendants will be deleted, including nodes in child Publications.
* `RemoveParentFromChildren` - Specifies that the deleted node will be removed from the children's parents.
            Children will become root if they have no other parents.
            If the children have other parents, those parents are preserved.
* `AssignChildrenToGrandparents` - Specifies that the parents of the deleted node adopt the deleted node's children.
            If the children have other parents, those parents are preserved.

DeployerAction.description:
Represents the action the deployer needs to take.

Members:
* `Commit` - The deployer should commit the transport package.
* `Wait` - The deployer should wait to commit the transport package.
* `Abort` - The deployer should abort the transport package.

LockType.description:
Defines the state (lock) of an item.

Members:
* `None` - The item is not locked.
* `CheckedOut` - The item is checked-out. This can mean either a temporary (edit) lock, a permanent lock (explicit check-out performed by user) or a workflow lock.
* `Permanent` - The item is permanently locked, that is using an explicit lock (check-out) action. Can be applied to versioned items (permanent check-out) and to organizational items.
* `NewItem` - The item is a new item, that is it has been created, but not checked-in for the first time yet.
* `InWorkflow` - The item is in a workflow.
* `Reserved` - The item is reserved by the system. This means it is checked-out/locked, but nobody owns the lock.

PublishTransactionState.description:
Represents the states a Publish Transaction can have.

Members:
* `ScheduledForPublish` - The PublishTransaction is scheduled to start at the specified date time.
* `WaitingForPublish` - The PublishTransaction is waiting to be processed.
* `InProgress` - The PublishTransaction is currently in progress.
* `ScheduledForDeployment` - The PublishTransaction is scheduled to be deployed at the specified date time.
* `WaitingForDeployment` - The PublishTransaction is waiting to be deployed at the specified date time.
* `Failed` - The PublishTransaction failed.
* `Success` - The PublishTransaction succeeded.
* `Warning` - The PublishTransaction succeeded but contains warnings.
* `Resolving` - The PublishTransaction is currently being resolved.
* `Rendering` - The PublishTransaction is currently being rendered.
* `Throttled` - The PublishTransaction is currently being throttled by the TransportService.
* `ReadyForTransport` - The PublishTransaction is currently ready for transport.
* `Transporting` - The PublishTransaction is currently being transported to the destinations.
* `Deploying` - The PublishTransaction is currently being deployed.
* `PreparingDeployment` - The PublishTransaction is currently being prepared for deployment.
* `PreCommittingDeployment` - The PublishTransaction is in the pre-committing deployment phase.
* `CommittingDeployment` - The PublishTransaction is being committed for the deployment.
* `WaitingForCdEnvironment` - The PublishTransaction is waiting for Content Delivery Environment to be online.

Rights.description:
Specifies the Rights used for security checks.

Members:
* `None` - No rights.
* `PublicationAccess` - Grants access to a publication.
* `PublicationManagement` - Grants publication properties update.
* `FolderManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on Folder.
* `StructureGroupManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on StructureGroup.
* `SchemaManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on Schema.
* `ComponentManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on Components.
* `ComponentTemplateManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on ComponentTemplates.
* `PageManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on Pages.
* `PageTemplateManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on PageTemplates.
* `ProfileManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on TargetGroups.
* `PublishManagement` - Grants rights to publish.
* `PermissionManagement` - Grants rights to change rights on Repository and permissions on Organizational Items.
* `WorkflowManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights to manage Workflow.
            To grant workflow management rights to a trustee, the WorkflowManager privilege must be used.
* `CategoryManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on Categories.
* `TemplateBuildingBlockManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on TemplateBuildingBlocks.
* `VirtualFolderManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on VirtualFolders.
* `BundleManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on Bundles.
* `BusinessProcessTypeManagement` - Grants create, update, delete rights on Business Process Type.
* `PublicationAdministration` - Grants repository-local administration rights.
* `All` - All rights.

Schema.description: Represents the data of a Schema defining the structure of content and/or metadata.

AllowedMultimediaTypes.description: Gets or sets access to the allowed Multimedia Types.

DeleteBundleOnProcessFinished.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Bundles based on this Schema should be deleted when a workflow process they are part of finishes.

Description.description: Gets or sets a description for the Schema.

IsIndexable.description: Gets or sets whether components based on this schema will be indexed during data publishing.

IsPublishable.description: Gets or sets whether components based on this schema can be resolved for data publishing.

IsTridionWebSchema.description: Gets whether the Schema qualifies as "Tridion Web Schema".

NamespaceUri.description: Gets the namespace URI (target namespace) of the Schema.

Purpose.description: Gets or sets the purpose for the Schema.

RootElementName.description: Gets or sets the name of the root element.

SchemaInstance.description: Represents the instance data of a schema.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'SchemaInstance' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Region.description: Gets or sets the root Region.

RegionXml.description: Gets or sets the Regions as XML.

Schema.description: Gets the link to associated schema for this Instance Data.

SchemaPurpose.description:
Defines a purpose of a Schema, that is in which items the Schema can be used.

Members:
* `Component` - Schema defines the content and metadata of Components with XML content.
* `Multimedia` - Schema defines the content and metadata of Multimedia Components.
* `Embedded` - Schema is included into other Schemas.
* `Metadata` - Schema defines the metadata of items (except for Components).
* `Protocol` - Schema defines the protocol fields of a Publication Target.
* `VirtualFolderType` - Schema defines the configuration data of a Virtual Folder.
* `TemplateParameters` - Schema defines the parameters of a Template.
* `Bundle` - Schema defines the metadata and process definition of a Bundle.
* `Region` - Schema defines the Region definition and metadata.

Configuration.description: Get or set the configuration data.

SecurityDescriptor.description:
The SecurityDescriptorData is a grouping of all the Rights and Permissions (allow and denies) for the trustees.
A SecurityDescriptorData is specific to a user and a context (IdentifiableObject).

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'SecurityDescriptor' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Permissions.description: Gets the Permissions of an Identifiable object for a trustee.

Rights.description: Gets the Rights of an Identifiable object for a trustee.

SingleLineTextFieldDefinition.description: Represents a single-line text field definition (in a Schema).

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

MaxLength.description: Gets or sets the maximum length constraint.

MinLength.description: Gets or sets the minimum length constraint.

Pattern.description: Gets or sets a regular expression pattern to constrain the value.

SingleLineTextListDefinition.description: Provides information about whether/how to present a list of allowed single-line text field values.

Entries.description: Gets access to the allowed values.

StartWorkflowInstruction.description: Represents the data for a StartWorkflowInstruction.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'StartWorkflowInstruction' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

ActivityTitle.description: Gets or sets the initial value for title of the first Activity.

Assignee.description: Gets or sets the initial value for assignee of the first Activity.

DueDate.description: Gets or sets the initial value for "Activity.DueDate" property of the first Activity.

ProcessDefinition.description: Gets or sets the Process Definition for creating Process Instance.

ProcessInstanceTitle.description: Gets or sets the initial value for title of Process instance.

Subjects.description: Gets or sets the items which participate in the Process.

WorkflowType.description: Gets or sets the workflow type of the Process.

StructureGroup.description: Represents the data of a Structure Group: an Organizational Item used to build the Publication's target structure.

Directory.description: Gets or sets the directory name.

IsActive.description:
Gets or sets the active state of the Structure Group. 
If the active state is set to false, the Structure Group and the items inside it cannot be published.

IsActiveResolvedValue.description:
Gets a value indicating whether this Structure Group and its items can be published.
Returns true if the active state of this Structure Group and all of its ancestors is true.
Returns false if the active state of this Structure Group or any of its ancestors is false.
The individual active state of each Structure Group is represented by the property "IsActive".

IsDefaultPageTemplateInherited.description: Gets or sets whether the default Page Template is inherited from the Structure Group's parent.

StructureResolveOption.description:
Represents the option to include the resolved items and/or structure.

Members:
* `OnlyItems` - Only item(s) will be resolved. This is the default value.
* `OnlyStructure` - Only Structure Group(s) will be resolved.
* `ItemsAndStructure` - Structure Group(s) along with item(s) will be resolved.

SynchronizationAction.description: Represents the data of a synchronization action of a Repository Local Object against its Schema.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'SynchronizationAction' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

FieldDescription.description: Gets the description/label of the field on which the synchronization operation was applied.

FieldIndex.description: Gets the index of a multivalued field in which the synchronization operation was applied.

FieldName.description: Gets the XML name of the field on which the synchronization operation was applied.

SynchronizationResult.description: Represents the data of synchronization of item content and/or metadata with the current schema.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'SynchronizationResult' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

SynchronizationActions.description: Gets the collection of "SynchronizationAction" objects containing all applied changes.

SynchronizedItem.description: Gets the "IdentifiableObject" with synchronized content and/or metadata.

SynchronizeFlags.description:
Specifies how the Repository Local Object should/can be synchronized with its Schema.

Members:
* `Basic` - Use only basic option, which includes re-ordering fields.
* `FixNamespace` - Fix the namespace of content and metadata element as per the schema.
* `RemoveUnknownFields` - Remove any fields which do not exist in the schema.
* `RemoveAdditionalValues` - Remove fields which occur more than allowed in MaxOccurs.
* `ApplyDefaultValuesForMissingMandatoryFields` - Apply default values to mandatory fields which are missing.
* `ApplyDefaultValuesForMissingNonMandatoryFields` - Apply default values to non-mandatory fields which are missing.
* `ApplyFilterXsltToXhtmlFields` - Apply Xslt transformation to Xhtml fields.
* `ConvertFieldType` - Convert field types as specified in schema.
* `UpdateRegions` - Update nested regions structure of the page.
* `All` - Apply all possible transformations.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'SystemPrivilege' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Title.description: Localized title of a system-wide privilege.

Description.description: Localized description of a system-wide privilege.

SystemPrivilegesDictionary.description: Represents a dictionary of the system-wide privilege keys associations with a collection of the Group's link.

SystemWideObject.description: Abstract base class for the data of all system-wide objects.

TargetGroup.description: Represents the data of a Target Group: used to target an audience based on certain conditions.

Conditions.description: Gets or sets access to the conditions that define the Target Group

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the Target Group.

TargetGroupCondition.description: Represents a condition on "membership" of a Target Group.

Negate.description: Gets or sets whether the condition should be negated.

TargetGroup.description: Gets or sets the Target Group to check "membership" against.

TargetType.description: Represents the data of a Target Type used as a target for publishing.

Priority.description: Gets or sets the Priority for this Target Type.

Purpose.description: Gets or sets the Purpose of this Target Type in context of a Business Process Type.

TaxonomyNode.description: Represents a Taxonomy node, including its child nodes.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'TaxonomyNode' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of the Taxonomy node.

Title.description: Gets or sets the title of the Taxonomy node.

AlternativeLabels.description: Gets or sets alternative labels for the Taxonomy node.

ChildNodes.description: Gets or sets the child nodes of the Taxonomy node.

Descendants.description: Gets the number of descendant nodes.

IsAbstract.description: Gets or sets a value indicating if the Taxonomy node is abstract.

Template.description: Abstract base class for the data of Templates.

Content.description: Gets or sets the Template's (text) content.

TemplateType.description: Gets or sets the Template Type.

TemplateBuildingBlock.description: Represents the data of a Template Building Block: a re-usable template module.

TextFieldDefinition.description: Abstract base class for Text Field Definitions (specified in a Schema)

UseForAutoClassification.description: Specifies whether the text field is used as input for automatic classification or not.

TrackingKeyCondition.description: Represents a condition on the value of a Tracking Key.

Keyword.description: Gets or sets the Keyword on which the Tracking Key is based.

Negate.description: Gets or sets whether the condition should be negated.

Operator.description: Gets or sets the operator used for comparing the Tracking Key's value against the "Value" specified in the condition.

Value.description: Gets or sets the value to compare the Tracking Key's value against.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'TreeNode' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

TridionActivityDefinition.description: Represents the data of a Tridion proprietary Activity Definition.

ActivityType.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance represents a decision or not.

AllowOverrideDueDate.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether "Activity.DueDate" can be changed manually, or not.

ExpirationScript.description: Gets or sets the script for Activity Expiration.

ExpirationScriptType.description: Gets or sets the script type of "ExpirationScript" of an Activity.

NextActivityDefinitions.description: Gets or sets the potential next activities in the Workflow.

PerformingTimeout.description: Gets or sets the timeout for performing current activity, in minutes.

Script.description: Gets or sets the script of an automated Activity.

ScriptType.description: Gets or sets the script type of "Script" of an automated Activity.

TridionProcessDefinition.description: Represents the data of a Tridion proprietary Process Definition.

Trustee.description: Abstract base class for the data of "Trustees": the data of Users or Groups.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description (full name) of the Trustee

GroupMemberships.description: Gets or sets access to the Trustee's Group memberships.

IsPredefined.description: Gets whether the trustee is predefined by the system.

TypeConstraint.description: Represents a type constraint for Component Presentation(s) in Region Schema.

UndoCheckOutRequest.description: Removes permanent lock and reverts to last major version of the versioned item.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'UndoCheckOutRequest' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

RemovePermanentLock.description:
A permanent lock is set when the user performs an explicit checkout action in the UI.
It is removed when the user performs an explicit undo checkout action in the UI.
Available values:
* True  removes the permanent lock after the check-in action.
* False  does not remove the lock after the check-in action, such as when the item is still being edited.

UnPublishInstruction.description: Represents the instructions needed for un-publishing an item.

StartAt.description:
Gets or sets the date and time when the un-publishing should be started. Should be specified in UTC format.
The value will be converted to UTC time if specified with time zone shift, e.g. "2020-01-24T17:24:50+02:00" will be converted to "2020-01-24T15:24:50Z"
Conversion is not happening if time zone shift is not specified.

UnPublishRequest.description: Represents the request during the un-publishing process.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'UnPublishRequest' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Ids.description: The identifiers of the items that will be send for publishing.

Priority.description: The priority of the un-publish action.

TargetIdsOrPurposes.description: A collection of Publishing Target instances (Target Types or Purposes) where the items are unpublished from.

UnPublishInstruction.description: Represents the instructions needed for un-publishing an item.

UnPublishResolveInstruction.description: Represents the instructions needed for resolving.

User.description: Represents the data of a User.

IsEnabled.description: Gets or sets whether the User is enabled.

IsEnabledEditable.description: Gets whether the enabled state can be modified.

IsPrivilegesEditable.description: Gets whether the privileges can be modified.

LanguageId.description: Gets or sets the language ID (LCID) of the User

LocaleId.description: Gets or sets the locale ID (LCID) of the User

Privileges.description: Gets or sets the User's system-wide privileges

UserLocaleInfo.description: Represents the information about User locale.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'UserLocaleInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

AmDesignator.description: Gets the string designator for hours that are "ante meridiem" (before noon).

DayNames.description: Gets the string array that contains the culture-specific full names of the days of the week.

FirstDayOfWeek.description: Gets the first day of the week.

FullDateTimeFormat.description: Gets the custom format string for a long date and long time value.

LanguageCode.description: Gets the ISO 639-1 two-letter code for the current language.

LongDateFormat.description: Gets the custom format string for a long date value.

LongTimeFormat.description: Gets the custom format string for a long time value.

MonthNames.description: Gets the string array that contains the culture-specific full names of the months.

PmDesignator.description: Gets the string designator for hours that are "post meridiem" (after noon).

ShortDateFormat.description: Gets the custom format string for a short date value.

ShortDateTimeFormat.description: Gets the custom format string for a short date and short time value.

ShortDayNames.description: Gets the string array that contains the culture-specific abbreviated names of the days of the week.

ShortestDayNames.description: Gets the string array of the shortest unique abbreviated day names.

ShortMonthNames.description: Gets the string array that contains the culture-specific abbreviated names of the months.

ShortTimeFormat.description: Gets the custom format string for a short time value.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'UserPreferences' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Favorites.description: Gets the collection of the User favorite links.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'UserProfile' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

UserRuntimeInfo.description: Represents the runtime information of the User.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'UserRuntimeInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

HasPublishRights.description: Gets whether the User has the publish rights.

IsAdministrator.description: Gets whether the User is a system administrator.

IsPublicationAdministrator.description: Gets whether the current User has the repository-local administration rights.

Locale.description: Gets the information about User locale.

ValidationError.description: Represents a validation error which is returned when validating an item.

ErrorCode.description: Gets the error code of the validation error or of the exception if any.

ExceptionName.description: Gets the name of the exception if any.

Location.description: Gets the location where the validation error occurred.

Message.description: Gets the detailed message about the validation result.

Source.description: Gets the name of the component/subsystem that generated the message.

ValidationResult.description: Represents the data of a validation result which is returned when validating an item.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'ValidationResult' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

Location.description: Gets the location where the validation error occurred.

Message.description: Gets the detailed message about the validation result.

Source.description: Gets the name of the component/subsystem that generated the message.

ValidationWarning.description: Represents the data of a validation warning which is returned when validating an item.

Location.description: Gets the location where the validation error occurred.

Message.description: Gets the detailed message about the validation result.

Source.description: Gets the name of the component/subsystem that generated the message.

VariablesDictionary.description: Represents multiple sets of variables grouped by name.

VersionedItem.description: Abstract base class for Versioned Items.

VirtualFolder.description: Represents the data of a Virtual Folder: an Organizational Item that dynamically collects its contents.

Description.description: Gets or sets the description of the Virtual Folder.

WorkflowInfo.description: Represents workflow-related information for items that can participate in a workflow process.

$type.description: Set to the name of concrete class, such as 'WorkflowInfo' (or a class name that inherits from this class)

ActivityConstraints.description: Gets or sets the constraints of the current activity.

ActivityDefinitionDescription.description: Gets or sets the Activity Definition Description of the current Activity Instance.

ActivityInstance.description: Gets or sets the Activity Instance in which the item is currently participating (if any).

ActivityState.description: Gets or sets the state of the current Activity Instance.

ProcessInstance.description: Gets or sets the Process Instance in which the item is currently participating (if any).

StartDate.description: Gets or sets the start date and time in UTC of the current Activity Instance.

WorkflowObject.description: Abstract Base class for the data of workflow items except for "ProcessDefinition" and "ApprovalStatus".

WorkflowType.description: Represents a data of Workflow Type.

WorkItem.description: Represents the data of a Work Item: the association between an item participating in workflow and an Activity.

Comment.description: Gets or sets a comment on the Work Item.

XhtmlFieldDefinition.description: Represents an XHTML field (a.k.a. Format Area) definition (in a Schema).

DefaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value.

Height.description: Gets or sets the height of the text area in the form-based User Interface.
